item.title: Any Means Necessary to Refuse Erasure by Algorithm: Lillian-Yvonne Bertram’s Travesty Generator
item.author: Zach Whalen
item.description: A NATION OF SPECIFIC CHAINS ON SHIPS CROSSING AN OCEAN SUMMONING ANY MEANS NECESSARY TO REFUSE ERASURE BY ALGORITHM A NATION OF REGULATED FRAY RIOTING DIGGING UP ANY MEANS NECESSARY TO REFUSE ERASURE BY ALGORITHM A NATION OF OLD DISPOSSESSIONS IN THE SHIP’S HOLD UNEARTHING ANY MEANS NECESSARY TO REFUSE ERASURE BY ALGORITHM 1 The passage quoted here is from Lillian-Yvonne Bertram’s poem, “A NEW SERMON ON THE WARPLAND” , which is included in their 2019 collection, Travesty Generator .
